title: Vintage Leather Sofa - Excellent Condition
description: Beautiful vintage brown leather sofa in excellent condition. 3-seater, very comfortable. Must collect. Smoke-free home.

title: iPhone 13 Pro 256GB - Unlocked
description: iPhone 13 Pro in Sierra Blue, 256GB storage. Unlocked, works with any carrier. Comes with original box and charger. Minor scratches on back.

title: Mountain Bike - Trek X-Caliber
description: Trek X-Caliber mountain bike, 29-inch wheels, 21-speed. Well maintained, new tires recently installed. Great for trails and city riding.

title: Dining Table Set with 6 Chairs
description: Solid wood dining table with 6 matching chairs. Seats 6-8 people comfortably. Some minor wear but structurally perfect. Buyer must collect.

title: PlayStation 5 with 2 Controllers
description: PS5 console in perfect working condition. Includes 2 DualSense controllers, all cables, and original packaging. 3 games included.

title: Designer Handbag - Michael Kors
description: Authentic Michael Kors handbag in tan leather. Gently used, no stains or tears. Comes with dust bag and authenticity card.

title: Coffee Machine - Nespresso Vertuo
description: Nespresso Vertuo coffee machine in black. Works perfectly, just upgraded to a newer model. Includes 20 coffee pods.

title: Gaming Laptop - ASUS ROG
description: ASUS ROG gaming laptop, RTX 3060, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD. Excellent performance for gaming and work. Barely used, like new condition.

title: Bookshelf - Solid Oak
description: Large solid oak bookshelf with 5 shelves. Sturdy construction, can hold heavy books. Dimensions: 6ft tall x 4ft wide. Must collect.

title: Electric Scooter - Xiaomi Mi
description: Xiaomi Mi electric scooter, 25km range, foldable design. Perfect for commuting. Battery still holds full charge. Comes with charger and lock.

title: Baby Stroller - Bugaboo
description: Bugaboo Cameleon stroller in excellent condition. All-terrain wheels, reversible seat, includes rain cover and cup holder. Smoke-free home.

title: Acoustic Guitar - Yamaha FG800
description: Yamaha FG800 acoustic guitar in great condition. Perfect for beginners or intermediate players. Includes soft case and extra strings.

title: Office Desk - L-Shaped
description: Large L-shaped office desk in dark wood finish. Plenty of workspace, cable management holes. Great for home office setup. Disassembles for transport.

title: Air Fryer - Philips XXL
description: Philips XXL air fryer, 7.3L capacity. Perfect for families. Barely used, works like new. Includes recipe book and all accessories.

title: Road Bike - Specialized Allez
description: Specialized Allez road bike, carbon fork, Shimano 105 groupset. Well maintained, new chain and cassette. Size 56cm. Serious cyclists only.
